column1: Electric Engineering via Study Centres MSc
column5: This course will cover a range of topics at the cutting-edge of the discipline using the latest digital tools. Topics will cover core aspects of Electronic Engineering along with their application in design and manufacturing. The project will also develop research skills and you will learn to apply these to real and current engineering problems.Project work will be a strong focus of the course and you will learn interactively by applying the skills you develop in our recently upgraded laboratory facilities.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
